description: This is a Python source file that sets up a logger wrapper, importing and utilizing an external logging module from 'ProxyStubGenerator.Log'. It defines a single factory function 'Create' to instantiate log objects with customizable verbosity and warning/doc issue display options.

methods.name: Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
methods.description: Factory function that creates and returns a log object using the external 'Log' class, with optional parameters for verbosity, warnings, and documentation issues display.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False):$/
ctags.signature: (name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
